thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Britain's easyJet revenues boosted as rivals reduce capacity

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Britain's easyJet revenues boosted as rivals reduce capacity
text:
LONDON, Jan 23 (Reuters) - British budget airline easyJet said on Tuesday that recent reductions in capacity by competitors in the industry were contributing to a positive trading environment, as revenues improved in the first quarter.
easyJet, Europeâ€™s no.2 no-frills carrier behind Ryanair , said total revenue in the first quarter increased 14.4 percent to 1.14 billion pounds ($1.59 billion) helped by lower growth from rivals in its markets and positive foreign exchange effects. ($1 = 0.7162 pounds) (Reporting by Alistair Smout; editing by James Davey)
